resources.string:
Welcome to Home Service App!
Our app connects users with skilled service providers for various home services, including cleaning, plumbing, electrical repairs, and more. We aim to simplify home maintenance by offering a seamless booking experience, secure payments, and real-time tracking.
Key Features: - Quick and easy service booking - Secure online payments - Real-time order tracking - Verified and trusted service providers - 24/7 customer support
Thank you for choosing our service. We are committed to providing you with the best home service experience!

Privacy Policy
We value your privacy and ensure that your personal data remains protected. By using our app, you agree to the collection and use of information in accordance with this policy.
1. **Information We Collect**: - Personal details (name, phone number, email) - Location data for service requests - Payment and transaction details
2. **How We Use Your Information**: - To provide and manage home services - To send notifications and updates - To improve user experience and app performance
3. **Data Security**: - We use advanced encryption and security protocols to protect user data.
4. **Third-Party Services**: - We may share data with payment processors and service providers for smooth transactions.
5. **Your Rights**: - You can update or delete your personal data by contacting support.
If you have any concerns, please contact us at **support@homeserviceapp.com**.

Terms and Conditions
By using the Home Service App, you agree to the following terms:
1. **Account Registration**: - Users must provide accurate details while signing up. - The account must be used for personal, non-commercial purposes.
2. **Service Booking**: - Bookings are subject to provider availability. - Cancellations may be subject to charges based on the provider\'s policy.
3. **Payments and Refunds**: - All transactions are securely processed via trusted gateways. - Refunds (if applicable) will be processed within 7 business days.
4. **User Conduct**: - Users must respect service providers and follow ethical practices. - Any fraudulent activity may result in account suspension.
5. **Liability Disclaimer**: - The company is not responsible for any direct or indirect damages resulting from service use.
If you have any questions, please reach out to us at **support@homeserviceapp.com**.
